title: T206 Hal Chase Blue Portrait PSA 8
author: sycks22

posts.post_title: T206 Hal Chase Blue Portrait PSA 8
posts.post_content: Open to trades.   Looking for HOFers (not necessarily T206's)
I would offer my entire collection for such a beauty, but as I'm as younger collector, it wouldn't be worth as much as that. It's a very nice item, though, thanks for sharing!
